reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.reviews: Engaging lectures and clear explanations. Challenging but fair exams.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.reviews: Excellent teacher! Always available for extra help and provides real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.reviews: Knowledgeable but sometimes moves too fast through complex topics.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.reviews: Passionate about the subject. Assignments are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.reviews: Makes difficult concepts easy to understand. Very patient with students.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.reviews: Enthusiastic about chemistry. Lab sessions are well-organized and informative.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.reviews: Engaging lecturer who brings theories to life with real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.reviews: Knowledgeable but can be intimidating. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.reviews: Passionate about literature. Encourages critical thinking and lively discussions.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.reviews: Brilliant mind. Challenges students to think deeply about complex concepts.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.reviews: Approachable and knowledgeable. Assignments are relevant and thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.reviews: Experienced in the field but lectures can be dry. Exams are challenging.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.reviews: Cutting-edge research incorporated into lessons. Inspiring for aspiring scientists.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.reviews: Passionate about art. Field trips to museums enhance the learning experience.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.reviews: Engaging lecturer who brings environmental issues to life. Great field work opportunities.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.reviews: Highly knowledgeable but can be hard to follow. Extra study required.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.reviews: Fascinating insights into language. Assignments are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.reviews: Brings real-world business experience to the classroom. Excellent networking opportunities.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.reviews: Passionate about cultural studies. Field trips and guest speakers enhance learning.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.reviews: Brilliant musician and teacher. Makes complex theory accessible and enjoyable.
